Alright guys, a lot of you have been asking via PMs. Here's what Delimiter can do if you're looking for an alternative to Dacentec.

**What makes Delimiter different:**

- Every server comes with a gigabit network port as standard, on our truly redundant, low-latency network
- Every server comes with its own dedicated KVM, no waiting, paying or hoping that one will be available when you really need it
- Every server comes with new or as-new disks, we do not use 5 year old second-hand or refurbished disks
- Every server has multiple power feeds, blade chassis are fed by two independent three phase supplies across 6 separate power modules
- Every server is a branded HP server, not some hand-me-down from the latest Ebay liquidation

**Deals for current Dacentec customers only**  
(must submit a current invoice as proof to sales@delimiter.com after ordering)

**Free IP Announcements for Providers**  
All setup fees waived on all IP announcements. All that's required is a public VLAN at $5/month. Email sales@delimiter.com to set this up, mention this offer.

**1 Month Free**  
Purchase any of the servers below on monthly, quarterly or yearly billing and we'll add 1 free month to your server's billing end date with proof of cancellation at Dacentec (must send within 14 days of receiving your new Delimiter server).
